variants.desc: Victims of Fragmentum corrosion pieced together into one bizarre creature, their numb faces forming a sphere without thought or emotion. Any part that was once human has since vanished.

skills.name: Iridescent Beam
skills.desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Focused Charge
skills.desc: Increases the ATK of all friendly units.

skills.name: Energy Burst
skills.desc: All targets' Energy gets regenerated after this unit suffers a killing blow.
